txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from the Steel Keep. They have found a gap in the walls which leads to the Frostdelf. Had my scouts more time, they would have mined the cavern and gathered mineral samples. We must return to properly survey the abandoned passage.

'The Frostdelf is but unexplored and could still be rich in minerals!'
Your mission is to mine the Frostdelf.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to the Frostdelf.
DNT Return to TBD with the minerals

You have been tasked with mining ore from the Frostdelf in the halls of Thikil-gundu.
A drake-wight attacks!
Surprise Attack
Complete Mission: Secrets of the Frostdelf
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Frostdelf. May the excavating favour you!'
Talk to Hórin
Mine the Frostdelf ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Well done! With these samples, we should be able to assess the Frostdelf for a future mining expedition. We may need to better clear the cavern of those strange drakes first though!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
Within the halls of Thikil-gundu, hidden riches await excavation from the darkest corners….\n\nYour mission is to mine the Frostdelf.
Mine the Frostdelf ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mission: Secrets of the Frostdelf
